name: Super Trashmouth Adventures
description:
Play as my stupid cat Trashmouth. He likes to run all over my house and drag my socks into his water bowl. THAT IS THE GAME

- Get socks!
- Put them in the water dish for POINTS BONUS (?) !! (!!!)
- Collect treats scattered through the house (ALSO POINTS!)
- More treats to earn more levels (DID I TELL YOU ABOUT POINTS? THEY ARE RAD)

Follow me on Twitter @rfnichols :)
